Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
Player represents a player who is currently playing in the match. Username can't be changed once player has been created. This class listen Worker class in order to delete a worker from the worker list when it is eliminated.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.lang.String username, Color color)
    Class constructors which constructs a Player with a specified username and a color for his workers.

    • checkWin

      public boolean checkWin​(Worker w)
      This method holds all the logic behind the Win check after move.
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker on which the check is
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if the player has won

    • canMoveWorker

      public boolean canMoveWorker​(Worker w, boolean startTurn)
      This method checks if the worker passed can move in at least one square.
      Parameters:
      w - is the player's worker on which method checks if it can move
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if worker passed can move in at least one square compatible with rules or not

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      This method checks if the player is blocked (if the player can't move, he loses)
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if at least one worker which player use can move in at least one square compatible with rules or not

    • canBuild

      public boolean canBuild()
      This method checks if the player is blocked (if the player can't build, he loses)
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if at least one worker which player use can build in at least one square compatible with rules or not

    • canBuildWorker

      public boolean canBuildWorker​(Worker w, boolean startTurn)
      This method checks if the worker passed can build in at least one square.
      Parameters:
      w - is the player's worker on which method checks if it can build
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if worker passed can build in at least one square compatible with rules or not

    • move

      public java.util.List<Error> move​(Worker w, int x, int y)
      This method holds all the logic behind a move. if the move is possible, it updates the model status. Else it send to view errors found during the check. It also controls if after the move, the player has won.
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker who wants to move
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to move
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if the move was done or not

    • build

      public java.util.List<Error> build​(Worker w, int x, int y, int l)
      This method holds all the logic behind a build move. If the build move is possible, it updates the model status. Else it send to view errors found during the check.
      Parameters:
      w - is the worker who wants to build
      x - is the x square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      y - is the y square coordinate where the worker wants to build
      l - is the level that the worker wants to build
      Returns:
      true or false to indicate if the build move was done or not

    • endTurn

      public boolean endTurn()
      This method is called at the end of each turn. It resets moves and builds counters and activates "End of Turn" powers.
      Returns:
      True if the player can end the turn, false otherwise.

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange​(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      This method is called when a specific events occurs in the Worker Class. It handles the events correctly. In this class it is used for remove a worker when it has been removed from Game.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - the event occurred.
